speaker: Vinod Kurpad
title: The AI Show: Ep 52 | Analyze unstructured docs and more with Azure Form Recognizer
description:
Vinod Kurpad is here to show us how new updates to Azure Form Recognizer helps analyze unstructured documents and might even simplify filing your taxes!
